a.n: From The First Moment: Alana Cruise & Damon Dice

p.k: Kira (Alix Lynx) is about to marry her handsome movie star boyfriend James except he gets cold feet and leaves her at the wedding. To escape the humiliation of dealing with the swarming press, Kira escapes to her friend's ranch to mend her broken heart. Falling in love again is the last thing on her mind..until she meets rugged cowboy Gavin (Damon Dice). From the first moment, the chemistry between them is undeniable. Can Kira break thru his tough shell and finally find true love?
